title: Ranil meets MR- A coffee morning?
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Opposition leader and the leader of the United National Party (UNP) Ranil Wickramasinghe called on President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees this morning on 14 May, a Senior Spokesperson from the President’s Media Unit said….
